directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook rotini at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes; drain. Rinse rotini with cold water to cool completely.
Toss cooled rotini, bell pepper, Greek vinaigrette, lentils, feta cheese, and red onion together in a bowl.
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek-style vinaigrette (such as Renee's® Gourmet)
title: Mediterranean Pasta and Lentil Salad
